QuestData.Title: WANTED: The Rime Huntress
QuestData.Description:
The Waycrest Guard is offering a reward for any hunter who can track down and eliminate the Rime Huntress from the vicinity of Highroad Pass.
Track her with caution. She is a ferocious beast, and has been known to ambush even seasoned hunters.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A ferocious wolf that terrorizes traders travelling through Highroad Pass.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat The Rime Huntress near Highroad Pass.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Guardsman Hayles in Arom's Stand.
QuestData.RewardText:
So someone has finally managed to track down the Rime Huntress? Now our traders can continue their routes to Tiragarde without fear of the beast.
Take your reward, and my thanks.
